short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notion Card is a Chrome extension that converts Notion content into card images, perfect for publishing online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One-click generation: Easily and quickly convert Notion content into card images. 
Visual optimization: Automatically adjust content layout for better social media presentation. 
High-quality output: Produce high-definition, vibrant card images for optimal visual impact.
User-friendly: Simple and intuitive interface design, no design experience required. 

Use Cases:
Self-media publishing: Enhance the visual appeal of your articles and posts to attract more attention. 
Content marketing: Create professional visual displays for your brand content to strengthen brand image. 
Knowledge sharing: Organize knowledge points and information into beautiful card images for easier dissemination and retention.
long.zh_CN:
一键生成：轻松快速地将 Notion 内容转换为卡片图像。
视觉优化：自动调整内容布局，以便更好地在社交媒体上展示。
高质量输出：生成高清晰度、色彩鲜艳的卡片图像，以达到最佳视觉效果。
用户友好：简单直观的界面设计，无需设计经验。

使用案例：
自媒体发布：提升文章和帖子视觉吸引力，以吸引更多关注。
内容营销：为品牌内容创建专业的视觉展示，以增强品牌形象。
知识分享：将知识点和信息整理成美观的卡片图像，以便于传播和记忆。
